Instruction: In a small saucepan, bring water to a boil.'
Stir in rolled oats, diced apple, and cinnamon.'
Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer, stirring occasionally, for about 5 minutes or until oats are creamy and apples are tender.'
'Stir in milk and cook for an additional 1-2 minutes until heated through.'
'Remove from heat and stir in honey.'
Serve warm, optionally topped with additional diced apple and a sprinkle of cinnamon.'
